SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT03
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message initiates a FIN session for the LT. It also allows the user to specify the scope of the session (input/output) and the destination delivery subsets to be associated with the selecting LT. The subsets are emptied in the sequence in which they are listed in the Select Command. If selected, the LT-directed queue is emptied before any other subsets.
This message cannot be issued by a synonym.
From: User To: GPA
Notes When field 204: <select-state> has the value NY or YY, then one of the following conditions must be met:
field 208: <lt-directed-queue> must have the value Y
field 338: <delivery-subset-list> must be defined.
When field 204: <select-state> has the value NY (output only), then the system only accepts the 05 Quit Command at input.
When field 204: <select-state> has the value YN (input only), then field 338: <deliverysubset- list> cannot be defined.
Field 204: <select-state> with the value NN is not allowed. The Trailer Block is only present if the message is sent by a Test & Training LT and contains a TNG trailer.
The default branch code XXX must be used in this message.
Field tag 501 is mandatory in SWIFTNet Phase 1 and not allowed in SWIFTNet Phase 2.

SystemField.Name: application-id
SystemField.description:
Application Identifier, where:
a) F = FIN application
b) A/L = GPA application
c) X = all applications

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: application-id
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Application Identifier, where:
a) F = FIN application
b) A/L = GPA application
c) X = all applications

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Application Identifier '" + $value + "'. Valid Application Identifier values are : F, A, L, X."

SystemField.Name: window-size
SystemField.description: Maximum number of messages sent or received without waiting for or sending acknowledgement. Value between 001 and 012.Default FIN session window size is 12.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: window-size
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Maximum number of messages sent or received without waiting for or sending acknowledgement. Value between 001 and 012.Default FIN session window size is 12.

SystemField.Name: select-state
SystemField.description:
LT select state, where:
a) YN = input only
b) NY = output only
c) YY = input and output.
Output refers to messages which are not LT-directed.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: select-state
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
LT select state, where:
a) YN = input only
b) NY = output only
c) YY = input and output.
Output refers to messages which are not LT-directed.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid State '" + $value + "'. Valid State values are : YN, NY, YY."

SystemField.Name: lt-directed-queue
SystemField.description:
Select output of messages from the LT-directed queue, where:
a) Y = yes
b) N = no

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: lt-directed-queue
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Select output of messages from the LT-directed queue, where:
a) Y = yes
b) N = no

SystemField.Name: delivery-subset-list
SystemField.description: Up to 30 delivery subsets can be selected.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: delivery-subset-list
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Up to 30 delivery subsets can be selected.

SystemField.Name: current-session-info
SystemField.description:
Current session information. For example: 00250000450000440000500000501 where:
a) session-number = 0025
b) isn = 000045
c) isnnak = 000044
d) osn = 000050
e) osnnak = 000050
f) ack-replay-indicator = 1

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: current-session-info
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Current session information. For example: 00250000450000440000500000501 where:
a) session-number = 0025
b) isn = 000045
c) isnnak = 000044
d) osn = 000050
e) osnnak = 000050
f) ack-replay-indicator = 1

fieldvalidation.name: E1
fieldvalidation.comment: When field 204:<select-state> has the value NY or YY, then one of the following conditions must be met: field 208: <lt-directed-queue> must have the value Y , field 338: <delivery-subset-list> must be defined.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When field 204: 'select-state' has the value NY or YY, then one of the following conditions must be met: field 208: 'lt-directed-queue' must have the value Y , field 338: 'delivery-subset-list' must be defined."

fieldvalidation.name: E2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid value for 'window_size'. Value must be between '001' and '012'."

fieldvalidation.name: E3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The default branch code XXX must be used in this message."
